ai-tika-s0401t18:1_1: There is no death in this matter, no deathless:
ai-tika-s0401t18:1_3: Or alternatively, it is due to the deathless emancipation of the deathless who have reached Nibbāna and the deathless as their object for the deathless.
ai-tika-s0401t18:1_5: The untroubled one roamed around (and shoots) with clothes:
ai-tika-s0401t18:1_6: “Having no more inside, they have no attachments.”
ai-tika-s0401t18:1_7: with energy roused up and serene,
ai-tika-s0401t18:1_10: Those who pass away he said to them,
ai-tika-s0401t18:3_0: Thus there is the plantains on the Uttarakuru
ai-tika-s0401t18:4_0: The hiding of the Ones is finished in one place because of the colour of the kasiṇas.
ai-tika-s0401t18:5_0: The first section for recitation is finished.
